column4: alright! I made multimedia keys working with keytouch AND I found a player that seeks from commandline (rhythmbox). now, final last time, why rhythmbox doesn't seem to open .wav files
if it doesn't then all I did is ruined O_O
i guess gstreamer doesn't support every type of wav file
nah that's just a 44khz pcm stereo ;) although indeed, gstreamer isa the key which is a good thing
